data.title: The Ghost Club
data.meta_description: Carrie, Chris, Jesse and Natalie are best friends and amateur ghost hunters. They’re faced with their most difficult investigation yet when they visit Carrie and Chris’ grandmother’s house and learn of a haunting legend. Solving the mystery isn’t the only task they must tackle though; they must also help Carrie and Chris’ mom keep her business afloat. Luckily, there’s no job too big or too small for The Ghost Club!
data.text:
This movie will make you use your imagination! It’s more of a guessing game than evidence presented as the kids, best friends, run their own amateur ghost hunters organization. They would fit right in with the “Scooby Doo” series.

The premise is that a ghost helps the kids find a hidden treasure (a bracelet) to help a brother and sister’s mother save her shop from back taxes. The supernatural elements are mentioned more than seen. We see the results of wind blowing and so forth and the kids’ imagination goes wild.

We are pleased to award this film our Dove Seal for all ages.
